title: Handle a Customer Inquiry about Container Status
description: A freight forwarder calls customer service to ask for the status of a specific container.

tasks.description: Get the container number from the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly records the container ID.

tasks.description: Search for the container in the Terminal Operating System (TOS).
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent successfully finds the container in the system.

tasks.description: Provide the container's current status (e.g., 'In yard, available for pickup', 'On vessel', 'Not yet discharged') to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately communicates the container's status to the customer.
